section.p: Cross off the from your Adventure Sheet. Targdaz uses it up (or so he says) in the creation of the special ring.

Note the
. While you carry the ring, all your abilities (i.e. CHARISMA, COMBAT, MAGIC and so on) are increased by one. Your Rank is also increased by two (which will increase your Defence by two) and your total unwounded Stamina score is increased by 10. If you ever lose the ring, you have to restore everything to normal.
